```{r, message = FALSE}

library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "Does.yourÂ.VA.doctor.or.clinical.care.provider.know.about.your.medical.cannabis.use."
t <- "Does your VA doctor or clinical care provider know about your medical cannabis use?"
q_data <- get_single_selection(data = raw_data, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot<- clean_single_select(q_data)
r <- plot_single_select(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q66_va_cannabis_use_knowledge.png', plot = r, device = 'png')

```

